name: Frederik Vercauteren
content: Person - COSIC Frederik Vercauteren Bio Degree in CS Engineering (1999) and Pure Maths (2000) obtained at K.U.Leuven. Started PhD at COSIC, department of Electrical Engineering in 1999. Moved to University of Bristol in July 2001. Lecturer at University of Bristol from Jan 2002. Obtained PhD from KU Leuven in Nov 2003. Post-doc at KU Leuven, COSIC from Oct 2004. CTO of Open Security Research, Shenzhen China from Jan 2016. Associate Professor at KU Leuven, COSIC from Oct 2017. Professor at KU Leuven, COSIC from Oct 2024. Research Applications in cryptography of Computational algebraic geometry Computational algebraic number theory Computer algebra Awards & Prizes (selection) PKC Best Paper Award (PKC, 2025) Best paper award at CRYPTO (CRYPTO, 2020) Publications List of publications on Lirias List of publications in COSIC database Information Contact information Room: B01.12
